item.column: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Parameters addin="Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.FieldTypeProviders.AdvancedXmlDataProvider"> <Parameter addin="Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.FieldTypeProviders.AdvancedXmlDataProvider" name="Preview value XSLT Stylesheet" value="System/Integration/OpenCatalog/GDSN/GDSNAdvancedDataPreview.xslt" /> </Parameters>
